name: Jumpy Rope Star
description:
Jump over the rope like your life depends on it! Tap to time your jumps just right to miss the rope and break all the stacks to complete the level!

Can you set the highest score among your friends? It's not as easy as it looks!

One mistake and you die! Simple as that!

Features:
- Single tap to jump play mechanics
- No Ads
- Free to Play
- Challenge your friends
